Project Description
A Drag-n-Drop Upload Control For Dynamics 365/CRM

This version of CrmXpress Drag-n-Drop Upload Control for Dynamics 365/CRM 2016/2015/2013 has been tested against Microsoft Dynamics 365/CRM 2016/2015/2013 On Premise and Online using Internet Explorer 11.

System Requirements

  • Microsoft Dynamics 365/CRM 2016/2015/2013
  • Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1 or Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2/2012
  • Microsoft Internet Explorer 10/11

Visit : http://blog.crmxpress.net for more tools, tips and tricks.

PS: Variant of this code was originally posted at http://blogs.msdn.com/b/chinmay/archive/2014/06/29/drag-n-drop-upload-control-for-dynamics-crm-2013.aspx
